summary: Updated service data to include an `image` field for each listed service item, using `/assets/generated/*.dim_800x600.jpg` paths. However, the diff does not add the required new image asset files under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and there is no diff evidence that the Services page now renders an image for every ServiceCard (REQ-14 AC).

missing_requirements.requirement: The Services page (frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx) renders an image for every ServiceCard; there are no service cards without an image on the page.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to `frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx` or `frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx` are included in the diff summary, so there is no direct evidence that image rendering is enforced for every card (vs. still being optional).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions ServicesPage and ServiceCard but no diff for them)
